name: matchmaking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of arranging marriages or romantic relationships between people: He did not welcome his parents' attempts at matchmaking. a matchmaking service/website/app See
matchmaker
More examplesFewer examplesMy husband suggested we do a little bit of matchmaking and introduce our single friends.My co-worker's matchmaking failed and the couple didn't choose to meet again. Her parents submitted her picture to a matchmaking service.
